favorites.ai_reason: This heartwarming comedy about an elf spreading Christmas cheer delivers infectious optimism and pure joy.
favorites.overview: A man raised by Santa's elves travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.
favorites.title: Elf

favorites.ai_reason: It portrays the horrors of the Holocaust and the emotional weight of survival and loss.
favorites.overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
favorites.title: Schindler's List

favorites.ai_reason: Based on a true story of a man's struggle with homelessness while caring for his son, evoking empathy and sadness.
favorites.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
favorites.title: The Pursuit of Happyness

favorites.ai_reason: An epic romance ending in tragic loss, capturing the pain of love and separation.
favorites.overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
favorites.title: Titanic

favorites.ai_reason: A raw depiction of grief and guilt after a family tragedy, with profound melancholy.
favorites.overview: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.
favorites.title: Manchester by the Sea

favorites.ai_reason: A heart-wrenching story about a young girl coping with loss, touching on themes of death and coming-of-age.
favorites.overview: Vada is obsessed with death. Her mother is dead, and her father runs a funeral parlor. When Vada's father hires Shelly, a makeup expert, and begins to fall in love, Vada is outraged and does everything in her power to split them up.
favorites.title: My Girl
